  • Constructor Details

    • DBMain

      public DBMain​(java.lang.String name) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructs database from expected DBNodes associated with ModelKeys(). DBNodes then self-construct in the JVM resources directory from the Model.keys files. Throws error if DBNode can't be instantiated
      Parameters:
      name - Database name
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - DBNode not found or able to be created throws error to caller

      Database Name

    • CreateNode

      public DBNode CreateNode​(java.lang.String nodeName) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates DBNode object whose root node is constructed from the ModelKeys default constructor
      Specified by:
      CreateNode in interface DBManager
      Parameters:
      nodeName - - Name of the class of DBNode. Must be a ModelObject ClassName whose keys are stored inside the ModelKeys static class
      Returns:
      - Instantiated DBNode
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - Could not create DBNode because of ModelObject ClassName error

    • DeleteNode

      public boolean DeleteNode​(java.lang.String nodeName) throws java.io.IOException

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      nodeName - - ModelObject ClassName
      Returns:

      Throws:

    • Sync

      public void Sync() throws java.io.IOException
      Synchronizes DB across all DBNodes calling SyncNode. If DBNode is flagged then DBNode should write itself. Method is sychronized in its own thread and completes before futher execution of the monitoring thread
      Specified by:
      Sync in interface DBManager
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - File I/O Error throws to caller

    • RunSync

      public void RunSync()
      Causes DB to execute synchronized thread taskings via interrupt() main caller to Database thread
